facts: Soot sprites are small, round balls ade from the soot that lingers in old and abandoned houses.
If the house the Soot Sprites dwell in becomes inhabited, they decide if the inhabitants are nice people. If they are, they will leave.
Soot Sprites are not capable of speaking human language and instead squeak or murmur when they are excited, angry, annoyed or happy.
Soot Sprites appear in the movies My Neighbor Totoro and Spirited Away.
